text: Donald Leroy Bren (born May 11, 1932) is an American businessman. He is chairman and owner of the Irvine Company, an American real estate development company. Bren's net worth is $17 billion, making him number 112 on the 2022 Forbes Billionaires List. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Real estate developers Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles
title: Donald Bren
